gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 121, Trail Blazers 99
gameRecap.excerpt: Boston became the first team to reach 50 wins this season after defeating Portland, 121-99. For Boston, Jaylen Brown led the way with 27 points, six rebounds, and five assists while aided by Jayson Tatum (26 points, five rebounds, eight assists) in the victory. Deandre Ayton finished with 22 points and 15 rebounds with Anfernee Simons adding 17 points (three 3PM) and four rebounds for Portland in the losing effort. Boston improves to 50-14, while Portland moves to 18-46 in the loss.
